meanings.definition: To concentrate on a particular area or subject
meanings.sent2: The chef specializes in making delicious desserts.
meanings.sent3: He specializes in fixing cars, but his own car is always broken!
meanings.sent4: Her mind specializes in finding beauty in the mundane.
meanings.sent5: The detective specializes in solving mysterious cases.

meanings.definition: To be highly skilled or trained in a specific field
meanings.sent1: The doctor specializes in treating rare diseases.
meanings.sent2: The athlete specializes in long-distance running.
meanings.sent3: The magician specializes in making things disappear, except his hat!
meanings.sent4: Her voice specializes in soothing troubled souls.
meanings.sent5: The artist specializes in capturing emotions on canvas.
